name: w
otheraliases: Dmel_CG2759, BACN33B1.1, CG2759, DMWHITE, DmWhite, Dmel\CG2759, EG:BACN33B1.1, W, White, c23, e(g), m(g), mini-white, mw, w(AT)[[13]]
summary: Enables amine transmembrane transporter activity; organic anion transmembrane transporter activity; and purine nucleobase transmembrane transporter activity. Involved in several processes, including aminergic neurotransmitter loading into synaptic vesicle; cGMP transport; and purine nucleobase transport. Located in pigment granule membrane. Is expressed in several structures, including Malpighian tubule; adult glial cell; embryonic/larval fat body; head; and lamina. [provided by Alliance of Genome Resources, Jul 2025]
